#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>

using namespace std;

bool isPrime(long long N)
{
	bool res = true;
	if (N <= 1)
		return false;
	
	if (N == 2 || N == 3 || N == 5)
		return true;

	if (N % 2 == 0 || N % 3 == 0 || N % 5 == 0)
		return false;

	for (int i = 4; i <= N / 2; i++)
	{
		if (N % i == 0)
			return false;
	}

	return res;
}

bool isPalin(long long N)
{
	bool res = false;
	long long orig = N;
	long sum = 0, digit;

	for (long j = N; j > 0; j /= 10)
	{
		digit = j % 10;
		sum = (sum * 10) + digit;
	}

	if (sum == orig)
		res = true;

	return res;
}

int main()
{
	long long N;
	cin >> N;
	while (true)
	{
		bool cond2 = isPalin(N);
		if (false == cond2)
		{
			N += 1;
			continue;
		}

		bool cond1 = isPrime(N);
		if (false == cond1)
		{
			N += 1;
			continue;
		}
	
		cout << N;
		break;
	}

	return 0;
}
